properties.Observatio: During the rainy season when too much water flows, Bank erosion occurs
properties.Descript_1: Vegetative cover improving (1.5m-2.0m wide) with Areca nut seedlings @ 1.5m spacing in two rows, Beetle creeper VP @ 3m spacing in a single row, Green gram as a cover crop including applying of compost manure, NPK fertilizer and maintenance
